name: 42-20 chilly day balaclava
notes:
knitted hat/balaclava for baby and children in drops air. piece is knitted in rib. size 0 to 4 years

drops design: pattern ai-007-by; yarn group c or a + a

**size**:
0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months (2 - 3/4) years
fits head circumference in cm:
approx. 34/38 - 40/42 - 42/44 - 44/46 (48/50 - 50/52)

**materials**:
drops air from garnstudio
50-50-50-50 (50-100) g colour no 10, fog

needles:
drops circular needle size 5 mm: length: 80 cm
drops circular needle size 4 mm: length: 40 cm
drops double pointed needles size 4 mm
the technique magic loop can be used â€“ you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size.

**knitting tension:**
17 stitches in width and 22 rows vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
